title: YAML deserialization RCE
details: YAML deserialization on admin endpoint enables unauthenticated remote code execution.
solution: 1) Patch YAML lib to version X.Y.Z\n2) Disable unsafe_load()\n3) Add input validation and WAF rule.

title: Verbose error exposure
details: Application leaks stack traces, framework versions revealed in errors.
solution: 1) Disable debug mode in prod\n2) Configure error handler to generic messages\n3) Log stack traces server-side only.

title: TLS misconfiguration
details: Internal API lacks TLS; risk of MITM.
solution: 1) Enforce TLS 1.2+\n2) Issue certs via ACME\n3) Set HSTS and pinning

title: SQL injection on /login
details: Detected ' OR 1=1 -- payload; WAF blocked attempts.
solution: 1) Parameterise queries\n2) Add input validation\n3) Expand WAF rule and add IDS alert

title: Prototype pollution chain
details: Prototype pollution in JSON parser; potential path to RCE via gadget chain.
solution: 1) Patch parser lib\n2) Freeze object prototypes\n3) Add SAST rule for dangerous merges

title: Directory traversal
details: Reads /etc/passwd via crafted path; inadequate sanitisation.
solution: 1) Canonicalise paths\n2) Block ../ sequences\n3) Add allowlist for served files
